name: Detect-O-Gromit (D.O.G 2)
description:
Detect-o-Gromit 2 is the official trail app for Gromit Unleashed 2, which will see Nick Park's Academy Award®-winning character Gromit return to Bristol in 2018 for his second starring role in the award-winning charity's sculpture trails, but this time he's not alone; the loveable pooch will be joined by his pal Wallace and arch nemesis Feathers McGraw!

The trail features 67 giant sculptures designed by high-profile artists, designers, innovators and local talent. Sculptures are positioned in iconic locations around Bristol and the surrounding area, perfect for a family day out around the city and beyond.

Use the app to navigate the trail, and learn about the sculptures, artists and sponsors of the trail. With fun trails to follow, challenges to win awards, and character camera frames to share your photos along the way, there’s fun for all the family!

You can track your progress around the trail, log your physical activity through integration with your device's native health app, and discover parts of Bristol you’ve never seen before.

What’s more, in purchasing this app, you are supporting The Grand Appeal, the Bristol Children’s Hospital Charity.
